subject: Re: [LH] Kate Bush -- Bad Neighbor!
body:
Donny Bravo wrote:

> A councilor adds, "I'm afraid the coast path and the beach were there 
> long before Kate Bush and I'm fairly confident they'll still be in the 
> same place with the same unhindered access long after she's gone."

Forget about the neighbours. I wouldn't bet against her on this. Coastal 
path boundaries on a cliff are usually not public domain, and can be 
fenced at will. The beach however, is a different story.
